title: Koisuru Finder No Hyouteki
alternative_title: 恋するファインダーの標的 ; Koi wo Suru x Target in the Finder Crossover ; KoiSuru x VF Crossover
status: 恋するファインダーの標的 ; Koi wo Suru x Target in the Finder Crossover ; KoiSuru x VF Crossover
description:
Description :
        Chaperon and photographer Takaba Akihito (Finder) has his hands full with Mizuno and Hiyama from KoiSuru when they go to Kyoto for their graduation trip.
